attributes.review: Back in the old days I used to love pudding, pudding was my whole life and I used to eat gallons of it every day, but then aliens attacked and ravaged my land and I was left puddingless. I swore to get revenge on those aliens and take back my pudding, and after years of training I am now ready!

this is the most disgusting app i have ever seen in my life. one time, the app made my phone electrocute me. i mean sure i accidentally dropped my phone in the toilet, but i’m 100% it was the apps fault. would NOT download this again😤😤😤😤
attributes.title: oh to see without my eyes ✖️👄✖️

attributes.review: I downloaded this to educate myself on 💓Trump 2020 💓 but as soon as the app installed on my phone I passed out, my sister had to uninstall the app from my phone before I woke up. Overall a horrible experience, 0/10.
attributes.title: I can't believe my experience.

attributes.review: Tried to download and use, but kept making my phone buggy and slow, app consistently crashes before I can do anything. Absolutely useless.
